DOC.detailed_description: The human clinical trial design longitudinal prospective study . A total 24 titanium implant modify SLA surface ( BLT SLActiveÂ® , Institute Straumann AG , Basel , Switzerland ) place mandibular first molar . 12 control group 12 test group .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients age 18 year old . 2 . Willingness comply study requirement . 3 . Partially edentulous mandibular first molar presence mandibular second molar 4 . Patients ASA I ASA II group . No relevant medical condition uncontrolled diabetes mellitus , osteoporosis , malignancy , irradiation blood dyscrasia . 5 . Free soft tissue mucosal lesion , caries , active periodontitis time implant insertion . 6 . Sufficient alveolar bone volume implant recipient site time insertion . 7 . Adequate oral hygiene . Fullmouth plaque score ( FMPS ) ( O'Leary et al . 1972 ) fullmouth bleed score ( FMBS ) ( Ainamo & Bay 1975 ) record percentage surface , four per tooth , patient need control periodontal condition ( FMPS 20 % , FMBS 20 % ) . 1 . Pregnant lactating female . 2 . Systemic disease likely compromise implant surgery ; uncontrolled diabetes mellitus . 3 . History irradiation head neck area . 4 . Smoking . 5 . Untreated periodontitis . 6 . Alcohol drug abuse . 7 . History Intravenous Bisphosphonate . 8 . Previously augment tooth extraction intend implant recipient site within last 6 month . 9 . The use regenerative procedure conjunction implant placement . 10 . Presence residual root implant recipient site . 11 . Stomatological disease . 12 . Clinical sign bruxism . 13 . Initial stability least 35Ncm
